Root.div: Assassin is sneaky and stabby or sneaky and shooty.
Root.p: When you get close to your target to make a surprise attack, roll+DEX if you use stealth or speed, or roll+CHA if you use deception or charm. On a 10+ choose two. On a 7-9 choose one.

ul.li: You don't get into melee with them
You create an advantage, +1 forward to you or an ally acting on it
Reduce their armor by 1 until they repair it

Root.p: When you attack with a melee weapon in each hand, add +1d4 damage to your melee attacks.
